aja Stillwater was a bloodforge mage in the city of Konigheim in the Utter East during the time of the Bloodforge Wars (648â€“657 DR).
Saja headed a benevolent order that watched over Konigheim. They were capable combatants and nigh invulnerable whilst occupying the keep. However, when yet another catastrophic fire swept through the city, Sajas order were drawn out into the streets. The leader of the Legendary Campaign seized the opportunity to strike in a bloodforge battle.
